Resolved Question Show me another » Why am I not seeing resturant tips show up on my credit card statement? I've been eating out alot lately, and paying with a credit card.
The tips I'm leaving are not showing up on my statement even days later. It still just says the amount of the food for 5+ items 2 years ago Report Abuse by Motortro... Member since: February 19, 2008 Total points: 8,245 (Level 5) Add Contact Block
Best Answer - Chosen by Voters Always leave tips as CASH monies and draw a line through the tip space if you use plastic.Put the cash on top of your signed credit card receipt when you pay.You will notice improved service from the waiter or waitress if you return to the place often.Only tools tip on a credit card. 2 years ago Report Abuse 80% 4 Votes Action Bar: 0 stars - mark this as Interesting! by MAGGIENI... Member since: June 22, 2006 Total points: 1,327 (Level 3) Add Contact Block the tips and the price of the meal are added. The waiter gets his from the management since most people use credit cards. If you keep your receipt, you will see where the total includes meal charge and tip. Watch your statement and keep the copies of signed receipts and compare. If not in order,call a govt agency(Start with FBI) don't call restaurant, because it may be a scam run by the restaurant or an employee. It is hard to tell.
